title: You haven't lived until you've seen Juicy Couture's Logo in Arabic.
content:
I've added 13 more arabic/english corporate identity mashups from my travels in the UAE.

Here's the link:

[http://www.graphicology.com/blog/2010/2/10/288-more-arabic-western-ident...](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013160202/http:/www.graphicology.com/blog/2010/2/10/288-more-arabic-western-identities-coexisting.html "http://www.graphicology.com/blog/2010/2/10/288-more-arabic-western-identities-coexisting.html")
author: graphicology
